text:
October 3, 1939
Dr. Irvin Stewart, Direotor
Committee on Scientific Aids to Learning
41 East 42nd Street
New York, N.Y.
Dear Doctor Stewart:
Under separate cover I am shipping
you ten more copies of the report on the recording
machine tests. I am also enclosing a bill for the
ten copies.
The only provision we have made
for further distribution is to make copies available
to those persons requesting them and contributing
50^. When we run out of our present supply we will
have to re-duplicate. HAEB has no funds available
for an elaborate publication.
Cordially,
Frank E. Sohooley
FES:JH
eno
